name: Single act evidence of practice
text: §466-11.5  Single act evidence of practice.  In any action brought under this chapter, evidence of the commission of a single act prohibited by this chapter shall be sufficient to justify a penalty, injunction, restraining order, or conviction, respectively, without evidence of a general course of conduct. [L 1989, c 110, pt of §2; am L 1990, c 34, §31]
